column4: I have an odd problem.  About 50% of the time when I boot, my mouse cursor is corrupt and various pixmaps on the screen are corrupt as well (although a lot oddly aren't).  Meanwhile, a screen grab looks much more corrupt than the real screen does.  The only major difference I've noticed is that the kernel module load order is different. :/
Could someone do me a favor and list their agpgart line from lsmod?
is it still used in these pci-express days?
No idea.  But I assume some people still have agp cards.
